document.full_text: the financial times wants to keep selling subscriptions for its digital news directly to readers rather than surrender control of new customers who sign up via apple's ipad, the managing director of ft.com said.
document.title: ft won't give up subscriber relationship to apple
lines_and_colors: the financial times wants to keep selling subscriptions for its digital news directly to readers rather than surrender control of new customers who sign up via apple's ipad, the managing director of ft.com said.
